resources.string: Please enter a valid email address
Please enter a password to log in
Please enter a valid email and password
Please enter your UNICEF GIS address (for example: rio.unicef-gis.org, nyhq.unicef-gis.org, etc.). \n\nYou\'ll only need to do this once.
Please wait while we configure UNICEF GIS

It seems you are not connected to the Internet at the moment. 

UNICEF GIS needs your cellphone to be connected for the initial setup process to finish. 

In order to complete the setup, please connect your cellphone to the Internet and open UNICEF GIS again.
